channel.description: Decide which authorization server is right for you Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 868 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Which auth server should you choose - https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/auth-servers/ Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.
